original_text: Sometimes you were publicly exposed to insult and persecution; at other times you stood side by side with those who were so treated.
korean_text: 혹은 비방과 환난으로써 사람에게 구경거리가 되고 혹은 이런 형편에 있는 자들과 사귀는 자가 되었으니

sentences.original_text: Sometimes you were publicly exposed to insult
at other times you stood side by side
with those who were so treated
